javadoc:
A class for dynamically collecting a stream of bytes and then later dumping those bytes to a stream
 It allows the bytes to be edited in the middle of collection

methods.name: getByte
methods.comment: Inspect the middle of the byte stream accumulated so far

params.name: streampos
params.comment: is the index of the byte to inspect

return.comment: a byte value from the stream

methods.name: insertByte
methods.comment: Overwrite bytes that have already been written into the stream

params.name: streampos
params.comment: is the index of the byte to overwrite

params.name: val
params.comment: is the value to overwrite with

methods.javadoc:
Dump a single byte to the packed byte stream
@param val is the byte to be written
methods.name: write
methods.comment: Dump a single byte to the packed byte stream

params.name: val
params.comment: is the byte to be written

methods.name: writeTo
methods.comment: Write the accumulated packed byte stream onto the output stream

params.name: s
params.comment: is the output stream receiving the bytes

name: PackedBytes
comment:
A class for dynamically collecting a stream of bytes and then later dumping those bytes to a stream
 It allows the bytes to be edited in the middle of collection
